Httr2 request wrapper

Source: R/connect.R
request.Rd

A helper function to send a httr2 request to the DRP API.

Usage

request(uri, method = "get", body = NULL, oa = NULL)

Arguments

uri

A string specifying the URI endpoint. Supports glue syntax.

method

A string specifying the HTTP method ("post" or "put")

body

A list or tibble to send as the body

oa

An OAuth list return by oauth() with a oauth_client, the auth_url, the redirect_uri and the scope

Value

An atomic vector, list or NULL

On this page

Developed by Fabio Steffen, Noemia Bruderer.
